text: Pichiye deya abisbasera'i matra brd'dhi matra, era dbara yara abisbasa posana kare tadera pathabhrasta kara haya, tara e baidha kare kono bachara ara eke abaidha kare kono bachara, yena tara thika rakhate pare sankhya ya allah nisid'dha karechena, phale tara baidha kare ya allah abaidha karechena. Tadera manda kajagulo tadera kacha cittakarsaka kara hayache. Ara allah patha dekhana na abisbasi sampradayake.
